creator: Wolves Interactive
descriptionHtml:
Motorbike Racing Game still in the development Phase
Your Reviews & Comments are very important for us

Prepare yourself to experience the best motorbike gaming app. More than 35+ motorbikes with real sound engines, 10 different modes to play and 750 levels to complete. Invite your friends online to race them in Los Angeles, Moscow, Istanbul, and more.

Start the engine, hit the gas and experience the thrill of handling a 400 km beast.
Compete with professional racers. Take a variety of scenes and enjoy this real driving experience. But do not let your guard down, because you will be arrested !

New Drag Racing Challenge Mode :
brings the realistic motorbikes to your mobile device with 37 Different bikes, HD graphics, Realistic Motorbikes Sounds and more Joyful gameplay than ever before

Outstanding Motorbikes
Diligent work on the models in an effort of presenting you most fabulous details on the Motorbike. The splendor of your Motorbike will stun the eyes. The ignition sound of engine will roar all over the map.

Exceptional Maps
Most exhilaratingly realistic maps in the game for you with three environments; Daylight, Sunset and Night in five popular cities; Los Angeles, Moscow, Istanbul, London and Paris.

Joyful Controls
The Motorbikes are exciting & Joyful to drive with smooth controls and examined movements to make you enjoy your game to the fullest.

Numerous Challenges
There are several challenges from Police chasing after you, collecting Cards in the highway, getting the goal Combo, reaching the racer you are following in Hunter, Overtake the cars in the highway, speeding up to finish the race in specific Time and Distance.


Features :
750+ Different levels
35+ Realistic motorbikes with Real Sound Engine
New Realistic Maps; Paris, Istanbul, Moscow, London and Los Angeles
Different environment in Daylight, Sunset and Night
First person camera
Playing with friends
10+ different missions


Pick up your Bike and prepare for challenges.
Download it now !!!!

creator: Wolves Interactive
descriptionHtml:
Motorbike is a new endless and drag racing game that takes you to another level of smooth driving simulations and high graphic quality. Drive your Motorbike in the endless highway roads, overtake traffic in challenging career missions, collect blueprints, unlock new motorcycles, upgrade them, and challenge your friends in real-time racing

REAL-TIME MULTIPLAYER RACING (PVP)
- Choose your best motorcycle and challenge other players in a real-time
- Join 750 different online missions and get prizes by beating your opponents
- Send requests and challenge your friends
- Invite your friends online to race them in Los Angeles, Moscow, Istanbul, and more.

KEY FEATURES
Drag Racing Challenge Mode
35+ Realistic motorcycles with Real Sound Engine with the ability for customization
750+ Different levels
Playing with friends
Multiple control modes: tilt, buttons or steering wheel
Unlock motorcycles by collecting or buying blueprints
Upgrade motorcycle features: Power, Handling, and Brakes
hit the gas and experience the thrill of handling a 400 km beast.
Different environment in Daylight, Sunset and Night
Variety of traffic vehicles: Trucks, Buses, Vans, Pickups, SUVs
Ability to use the Nitrous feature in multiplayer mode
Smooth and realistic driving
New Realistic Maps; Paris, Istanbul, Moscow, London and Los Angeles
First person camera
There are 10+ several challenges from Police chasing after you, collecting Cards in the highway, getting the goal Combo, reaching the racer you are following in Hunter, Overtake the cars in the highway, speeding up to finish the race in specific Time and Distance.




Pick up your Motorbike and prepare for challenges.
Download it now!!!!

REAL-TIME MULTIPLAYER RACING (PvP)

Drive your Motorbike in the endless highway roads, overtake traffic in challenging career missions, collect blueprints, unlock new motorcycles, upgrade them, and challenge your friends in real-time racing

REAL-TIME MULTIPLAYER RACING (PvP)
- Choose your best motorcycle and challenge other players in Real-time
- Join 750 different online missions and get prizes by beating your opponents
- Send requests and challenge your friends
- Invite your friends online to race them in Los Angeles, Moscow, Istanbul, and more.

KEY FEATURES
Drag Racing Challenge Mode
35+ Realistic Motorcycles with Real Sound Engine and the Ability for Customization
750+ Different Levels
Play with Friends
Multiple Control Modes: Tilt, Buttons and Steering Wheel
Unlock Motorcycles by Collecting or Buying Blueprints
Apply Various Upgrades to Your Motorcycle; Engine, Turbo, Wheels, Nitro, Brakes and Handling.
Hit the Gas and Experience the Thrill of Handling a 400 km Beast.
Different Environment in Daylight, Sunset and Night
Variety of Traffic Vehicles: Trucks, Buses, Vans, Pickups, SUVs
Use the Nitrous to Get Extra Speed and Win the Challenges
Smooth and Realistic Driving
New Realistic Maps; Paris, Istanbul, Moscow, London and Los Angeles
First Person Camera
There are 10+ Different Challenges from Police Chasing you, Collecting Cards on the Highway, Getting the Combo Target, Reaching the Racer you are Following in Hunter Challenge, Overtake the Cars in the Highway, Speeding up to Finish the Race in Specific Time and Distance Challenges.




Pick up Your Motorbike and Prepare for the Challenge.
Download it Now!!!!

This game requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply)
FOLLOW US

creator: Wolves Interactive ™️
descriptionHtml:
🏍️ Get ready for the ultimate motorcycle racing experience in "MotorBike: Drag Racing Game." Race through traffic, and feel the adrenaline 🚀

🔥 Ignite your passion for motorcycle racing and prove your skills in real-time multiplayer showdowns. Compete against others, complete missions, and dominate the race to supremacy! 🏆💥

Key Features:

🏍️ Try Drag Racing Challenge Mode.
🎶 Get 35+ Realistic Motorcycles.
🔥 Conquer 750+ Heart-Pounding Levels.
👥 Race Vs Friends.
🎮 Choose Control Modes.
🔓 Unlock Motorbikes.
💨 Handle a 400 km Beast on the Highway.
🚚 Navigate Traffic Variety.
💥 Use Nitrous Boost.
🚗 Enjoy Realistic Driving.
🌍 Explore New Maps.
🏁 Take on 10+ Unique Challenges.

Racing fanatics, this is the game you've been waiting for. Let's hit the road, race, and rule the traffic. Twist the throttle, and become the ultimate traffic rider legend! 🤩🛵💨

🏁 Get ready for the ultimate 🏍️ motorbike racing experience in the world of drag racing! This game is all about the thrill of the 🏁 race, and you'll have the chance to prove your riding skills and become a true motorbike legend. With 35+ realistic 🏍️ motorbikes to choose from, each with authentic sound engines and endless customization options, you can transform your bike into a racing beast that's ready to dominate the competition.

With a whopping 750+ heart-pounding levels, this game will test your bike racing prowess to the limit. Can you conquer them all and complete the challenging career missions? To make things even more exciting, you can team up with friends for MotorBike Collaboration and form racing alliances. Competing together adds a whole new dimension to the 🏍️ racing experience.

When it comes to control, you have multiple options to choose from - tilt 📱, buttons 🎮, or steering wheel 🏎️. Pick the control mode that suits your style for the ultimate 🏍️ bike racing experience. And to unlock new 🏍️ motorbikes, you can either collect blueprints 📜 or purchase them. Upgrading your bikes is essential for peak performance, so apply various upgrades like boosting your engine 🚀, turbocharging, upgrading wheels 🏎️, igniting nitro 💥, mastering brakes 🛑, and honing your handling skills 🚀!

Feel the adrenaline rush as you handle a 400 km 🏍️ beast on the highway, racing through diverse environments that include daylight ☀️, sunset 🌅, and night 🌌 races. But it's not just about speed; you'll also need to navigate through various types of traffic 🚗, including trucks 🚚, buses 🚌, vans 🚐, pickups 🚙, and SUVs 🚛. Show off your traffic rider skills and dodge through traffic like a pro.

When you need that extra burst of speed, don't forget to activate the 🚀 nitrous boost. It can be a game-changer when you're facing tough challenges. The driving experience in this game is smooth and ultra-realistic, making it one of the most realistic motor racing simulations ever. Plus, you get to explore realistic maps of iconic cities like Paris 🗼, Istanbul 🕌, Moscow 🏰, London 🇬🇧, and Los Angeles 🌴, all with stunning graphics 🌟.

If you want to immerse yourself even further in the action, switch to the first-person camera view 🎥 and feel like you're in the driver's seat. And with over 10+ unique challenges 🏆, including police chases 🚓, highway card collection 🃏, combo targets 🎯, hunter challenges 🏹, overtaking 🚦, time ⏳, and distance 📏 races, there's never a dull moment in this adrenaline-fueled 🏍️ motorbike racing game. So, get ready to rev your engines and embark on an epic racing journey that will test your skills and push you to become a true motorbike racing legend! 🏍️🔥🏆

Don't miss out on the excitement. Download now, and let's race! 🏁🏍️

To play this game, you must maintain a continuous internet connection.

https://www.instagram.com/motorbikeracing/
https://www.youtube.com/c/Wolvesinteractive

This game is all about the thrill of the 🏁 race, and you'll have the chance to prove your riding skills and become a true motorbike legend. With 35+ realistic 🏍️ motorbikes to choose from, each with authentic sound engines and endless customization options, you can transform your bike into a racing beast that's ready to dominate the competition.

With a whopping 750+ heart-pounding levels, this game will test your bike racing prowess to the limit. Can you conquer them all and complete the challenging career missions? To make things even more exciting, you can team up with friends for MotorBike Collaboration and form racing alliances. Competing together adds a whole new dimension to the 🏍️ racing experience.

When it comes to control, you have multiple options to choose from - tilt 📱, buttons 🎮, or steering wheel 🏎️. Pick the control mode that suits your style for the ultimate 🏍️ bike racing experience. And to unlock new 🏍️ motorbikes, you can either collect blueprints 📜 or purchase them. Upgrading your bikes is essential for peak performance, so apply various upgrades like boosting your engine 🚀, turbocharging, upgrading wheels 🏎️, igniting nitro 💥, mastering brakes 🛑, and honing your handling skills 🚀!

Feel the adrenaline rush as you handle a 400 km 🏍️ beast on the highway, racing through diverse environments that include daylight ☀️, sunset 🌅, and night 🌌 races. But it's not just about speed; you'll also need to navigate through various types of traffic 🚗, including trucks 🚚, buses 🚌, vans 🚐, pickups 🚙, and SUVs 🚛. Show off your traffic rider skills and dodge through traffic like a pro.

When you need that extra burst of speed, don't forget to activate the 🚀 nitrous boost. It can be a game-changer when you're facing tough challenges. The driving experience in this game is smooth and ultra-realistic, making it one of the most realistic motor racing simulations ever. Plus, you get to explore realistic maps of iconic cities like Paris 🗼, Istanbul 🕌, Moscow 🏰, London 🇬🇧, and Los Angeles 🌴, all with stunning graphics 🌟.

If you want to immerse yourself even further in the action, switch to the first-person camera view 🎥 and feel like you're in the driver's seat. And with over 10+ unique challenges 🏆, including police chases 🚓, highway card collection 🃏, combo targets 🎯, hunter challenges 🏹, overtaking 🚦, time ⏳, and distance 📏 races, there's never a dull moment in this adrenaline-fueled 🏍️ motorbike racing game. So, get ready to rev your engines and embark on an epic racing journey that will test your skills and push you to become a true motorbike racing legend! 🏍️🔥🏆

Don't miss out on the excitement. Download now, and let's race! 🏁🏍️

To play this game, you must maintain a continuous internet connection.

creator: Wolves Interactive ™️
descriptionHtml:
Embark on the ultimate 🏍️ bike racing adventure that's bound to get your adrenaline pumping! Dive into a world where speed, precision, and thrill meet to create an unforgettable dirt bike and xtreme motorbike experience. 🚀

Introducing the pinnacle of bike games - a realm where the roar of engines and the rush of wind become your new reality. Welcome to the ultimate bike race simulator, designed to redefine the limits of dirt bike games and motorbike racing. 🌟

🔥 Game Features: 🔥

🏁 Real-Time Multiplayer Racing: Challenge racers worldwide in heart-pounding PvP battles.
🎮 Diverse Game Modes: From high-speed highway chases to intense dirt bike arenas.
🛠️ Customize Your Ride: Elevate your dirt bike or xtreme motorbike with endless customization options.
🌐 Global Leaderboards: Compete against friends and players globally to become the bike game champion.
🌆 Stunning Environments: Race through beautifully rendered cities and rugged terrains day and night.
🏆 Rich Rewards & Challenges: Unlock new bikes and gear by conquering various challenges and missions.
Deep Dive into Game Features:

Real-Time Multiplayer Racing (PvP): Feel the thrill of real bike race action by competing against live opponents in exhilarating multiplayer modes. Whether you're dodging traffic in a high-speed chase or battling it out in the dirt bike arena, every race is a chance to prove your prowess.

Varied Game Modes: Our bike game goes beyond the ordinary, offering a rich selection of modes. From the classic rush of bike traffic highway racing to the strategic battles in dirt bike games, there's always a new challenge waiting around the corner.

Customization at Your Fingertips: Dive into the garage where your dirt bike or xtreme motorbike awaits your personal touch. Upgrade your ride to boost performance on the track and style it to stand out in the crowd.

Conquer the Leaderboards: Race your way to the top of the global leaderboards by mastering each bike race and challenge. Show the world your skill in navigating the most demanding bike games arenas.

A World of Racing: Experience the beauty and challenge of varied environments. From the bustling streets of iconic cities to the challenging dirt tracks outside town, each setting offers a unique racing experience.

Pro Tips for Aspiring Champions:

Master the art of timing your nitrous boost to leave your opponents in the dust.
Keep collecting blueprints to unlock more powerful bikes and upgrades.
Remember, overtaking at high speeds and driving against traffic can earn you extra points and cash.
Night races offer the chance for increased rewards, so don't shy away from the dark.
Terms and Policy:

Embrace the thrill with respect for all players. Our terms and policies are designed to ensure a fair and enjoyable experience for everyone. Dive into the details to make the most of your racing adventure.

🚀 Are you ready to dominate the bike racing world? 🚀

Download now and join the ranks of bike game enthusiasts and dirt bike champions worldwide. Your next great adventure on two wheels starts here!

Download for FREE and start your journey to become the ultimate bike racing legend! 🌟

Stay Connected:
For the latest news and updates, follow us on:
https://www.facebook.com/Motorbike.Racing.Game
https://www.youtube.com/c/Wolvesinteractive

http://www.wolvesinteractive.com/legal/term-of-use
